From: " 
(CMG)" <E
> 
To: " (USANYS)" " 
Subject: Question from HQ 
Date: Fri, 16 Aug 2019 23:17:54 +0000 
(USANYS)" 
and., 
My HQ has the following question on the underlying case, can you please forward this to the prosecutors on the 
underlying case? Thank you. 
o  In addition to BOP policies, did SDNY have requirements to memorialize Epstein's phone calls related to the 
underlying case? If so, were they followed? 
U.S. Department of Justice 
Office of the Inspector General 
New York Field 
Office 
EFTA00027978
